subject: Re: This is way toooo funny!
author: Adrienne
full_text:
LOL! Love it!  On the other subject, they don't usually answer my questions now either though they did with the 12-649 more often.... Thansk!

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Testing a tiny box, it uses an external echo chamber, but there is so much
> signal pick up inside the cabinet that the panel speaker is impossible to
> use in chamber mode, so iwas suing a boombox fed off the line output for
> sound. So I did another test, then uplugged the external echo chamber, and
> at 5 seconds a woman says "Oh God!, He Unpluggedd it".
> 
> So, maybe to reduce feddback in other boxes, need to shield the audio
> section more than just using shielded cable.
> 
> F-S
>
